metadata.title: USN-6121-1 -- Nanopb vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Nanopb incorrectly handled certain decode messages. An attacker could possibly use this cause a denial of service or expose sensitive information. (CVE-2020-26243)  It was discovered that Nanopb incorrectly handled certain decode messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2021-21401)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6121-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnanopb-dev - 0.4.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 nanopb - 0.4.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
